attributes.action: Look into saving RSPB Titchwell Marsh from the North Sea
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The RSPB has decided to let the sea encroach on their reserve at Tichwell Marsh (North Norfolk). The RSPB likes to 'Save the Sumatran Rain Forest' or joins the umbrella group opposing a third runway at Heathrow, but does not allow it's members to raise concerns about Titchwell. If you do not agree with the decision, please sign this petition.
